title: Ticket #4748: Have non-zero default for DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE
description:
Stuart at LIGO suggested that we have an out-of-the-box non-zero setting for DAGMAN_MAX_JOBS_IDLE. I figure this is not a bad idea -- most users would probably never notice, and the ones that do notice are the ones that need it. And a user or site can always override the default if they need to.

I'm thinking the default should be pretty high -- maybe something like 1000. We'll have to think about that a bit.
remarks:
2015-Jan-07 17:15:12 by wenger:
Just talked to ToddT about this, and we agreed on a default of 1000 -- hopefully you should only hit that if you'd be having big problems without it.

2015-Jan-12 16:36:28 by wenger:
Committed to master/8.3; I'm going to assign this to Zach for a retroactive review.

2015-Sep-22 13:52:22 by wenger:
I'm going to resolve this ticket, since it's been in the code for over half a year.
